question: Which Indian IT giant has surpassed Accenture to become the world's most valued IT services company?
explanation:
Indian IT major Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) has surpassed Accenture, to become the world's most valued IT services company.
The Market Capitalization of TCS surged to USD 169.9 billion recently. Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) is also Indiaâ€™s largest software exporter.
